member.name: M:Camalot.Common.Extensions.CamalotCommonExtensions.ToDatabaseHash(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the string to an SHA1 hash
member.remarks: This is the equivalent of CAST(HASHBYTES('SHA1', RTRIM(LTRIM(LOWER([COLUMN_NAME])))) AS VARBINARY(20)) in TSQL.
